posts.postText:
Went to the nether today on the goldcraft server. I spawned on top of the top of the map. /home dont work so i cant get out have to wait for an admin to tp me out.
 http://i51.tinypic.com/34rhc9u.png 
very deep lava

(Day 3)What a nice sea of bedrock and great view of the sunset.
 http://i52.tinypic.com/nqrzat.png 
never ending bedrock
Just to say one problem with the nether gates...... everytime you go through one gate another gate is created on the other end..... now i have like 3 gates in my house....

>> Just to say one problem with the nether gates...... everytime you go through one gate another gate is created on the other end..... now i have like 3 gates in my house.... 

Free obsidian. xD You're still stuck in the nether?

Something similar happened to me. However, apparently I'm in the nether clientside. the blocks for the nether are not glitched for me, but people see me in the normal world. I see the normal sky, and nether everything else.

>> Went to the nether today on the goldcraft server. I spawned on top of the top of the map. /home dont work so i cant get out have to wait for an admin to tp me out.
 


The Nether is still  very  bugged in multiplayer.... The only way your going to be able to somewhat successfully go to the Nether in the Goldcraft server, is to stop the server and have an admin set hellworld to true... making anyone who joins spawns in hell :)

It works better now, but it's still buggy. Use nether at your own risk. 

/lock
